How did we get our start?

In 2016, a 5-person team with the same dream and determination founded Tomxcute. Today, we are a company that has more than 200 staff and owns over 6 departments with its products popularly sold in 10 different countries. By 2022, our sales volume has reached 5,000,000. This is where we get our start.

Tomxcute product accessories

Item model number ‏ : ‎ 0004-F
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ August 27, 2021
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ tomxcute
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B09DSVFNRW

Double filtration system: Equipped with activated carbon filter and pre-filter sponge, the automatic cat and dog water fountain can provide your pet with pure drinking water and keep healthy.
3.2 L/108 Oz Large Capacity: The capacity of water fountain is 3.2L, and the high and low water level lines are marked in the container, and the effective volume is more than 3L, very suitable for multi-pet families.
Ultra-quiet: The 1.5W pump is super silent when running, keep it below 20db, only the sound of water flow can be heard, even if it runs at night, it will not affect your sleep.
Encourage Drinking : This cat water fountain is equipped with a faucet and spring surge modes which match Habits of drinking water under the tap of cats, dogs. The dynamic water flow helps attract pets to drink,which can prevent your pet suffering from urinary and kidney diseases.
Customer Support: For any questions, support or complaint, please feel free to contact us, we will help you solve the problem 24H.

Dual Filtration pet water fountain

Filter hair, debris and large particles, remove odor and impurities.Protect the drinking water health of pets such as cats and dogs.

Easy to clean

TOMXCUTE which can be washed by hand or machine washed in the dishwasher. It is recommended to clean once a week.

stainless steel pet fountain

our pet fountain is made of imported total 304 stainless,High grade Stainless Steel Drinking Fountain is unbreakable, durable and easy to clean

Read more

Sleep-like quiet

The noise level is less than 20 decibels, creating a more quiet and comfortable environment for you and your pet, No power consumption too much.

Large capacity

No matter where you go, you don’t have to worry about pet drinking water. 3.2L large-capacity pet water dispenser.

5.What You Will Get:

1 x Pet Water Fountain, 1 x Adapter（AC 100-240V）, 1 x Pre-filter Sponge, 1 x DC Pump, 3 x Filters, 1 x Instruction Manual

Read more

According to the various behaviors of pets, the faucet type pet water dispenser is more favored by cats and dogs

Q: How often should I clean the drinking fountain?

A: We recommend cleaning the water dispenser every two weeks.

Q: How can I get the filters for 2-4week replacements?

A: We also sell the replacement filters online. If you have any questions, please feel free to find us.( 3 carbon filters included in the package of the cat fountain )

Q: How can I judge the water level in the drinking fountain?

A: Due to technical difficulty, it is not easy to provide a visible window for the stainless steel water dispenser, but we have marked the “MIN” and “MAX” lines in the water tank.

Q: What should I pay attention to about the pump?

A: Firstly, the pump should be cleaned every 2 week; then if the water level in the tank is too low, the water pump still keeps running and prone to fail. Please add water to the water tank in time.

Q: How long is the power cable?

A: The length of the cable is 180 cm.

Q. Noise Level Up ？

Check if it`s empty or water level drop below minimum, then refill the fountain under max level. Check if there are hairs blocking the impeller of the water pump.Sometimes the impeller was totally encrusted in calcium. Please clean the pump weekly to extend the life , and more importantly, it is healthier for pets to drink water.Any questions and concerns, please send message to us on Amazon, and we will give you a satisfied solution within 16 hours.

item.content:encoded:
Price: $22.98
(as of Nov 30,2022 10:26:48 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Let’s protect your home and help dogs have more fun!

Dogs are known to be terrible chewers when they feel alone and grow teeth. Now, our family chew toys can protect your shoes, clothes, and even your furniture!

KILL ALL NEGATIVITY TO BUILD MORE POSITIVE ENERGY ALL DAY !

4 x Rubber Dog Chew Toy

Made of natural rubber, it is more flexible, durable and safe for your dog to chew and clean his teeth. Allow your dog to breathe better and have a healthier mouth. The cute design makes it easier for your dog to grasp. Puppy chew toy has small dimples that can really soothe your puppy’s gums. Brightly colored dog chew toys are easy to use and can satisfy your dog’s natural urge to chew.

10 x Rope Dog Toy

Tightly hand-woven cotton rope toys for tug-of-war and catch games. With a large selection of rope toys, you can easily replace damaged toys and actually have a longer life span. Your pup will have fun playing with them while keeping them off your shoes or furniture.

1 IQ dog funnel ball and 2 loofah tooth cleaning dog toys

Made of hard plastic, these snack dispensing balls are durable and suitable for dogs to chew. The surface has a regular texture so it won’t roll too far and your dog can easily grab it. Also, your dog will love tossing and rolling the ball to remove treats when they hear the cute squeaking sound.

Perfect Gift for Puppies

20 Pcs valued puppy chew toys great size for teething puppies. An Idea Choice for Your Puppies!

Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 9 x 7.8 x 3.93 inches; 2.4 Pounds
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ September 30, 2021
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ qinhe
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B09HJR2GBB

【Small Puppy Toys For Furniture Protection】: Are you worried about your puppy chewing on the sofa, shoes, boredom, loneliness and releasing energy while teething? ​Our toys are designed for puppy teething to help change your puppy’s bad chewing behavior, stop worrying, and keep your furniture safe. These puppy chew toys for teething not only clean the incisors, but also help clean the plaque hidden in dead spots, removing plaque and preventing cavities. Keep your puppy’s teeth healthy!
【Interactive Training Small Dog Toys】: The snack ball is a great teething toy for dogs, and it can improve their IQ as they learn to toss and roll it for snacks. When dogs receive a healthy balance of physical and mental stimulation, they feel happy and well-adjusted. A variety of rope toys are perfect for tug-of-war, tossing and fetch games that promote relationships while interacting with your pet. Buy our puppy chew toys and make your dog smarter and happier!
【Safe And Tight Puppy Teething Chew Toys】: The dog rope toy is made of 100% natural washable cotton, non-toxic and odorless, so your pet can chew and play safely. Our cotton rope dog toys are thin, but tough and durable. The wisdom balls and dog bones are also very chewy. If your dog is an aggressive chewer, then these puppy toys are not indestructible. They should only be played with under supervision. Dog toys bulk also keep the toys fresh in your dog’s mind
【Quality Gifts And Service】: This puppy teething toy set is a great gift for friends who have puppies. It is also a great gift for your little family member. From fun indoor activities to outdoor play with your dog, just one set of puppy chew toys is enough to give your dog more fun and exercise in his daily life! If you have any questions about our products, please feel free to contact us, we are always ready to help you solve your problems!


Let’s protect your home and help dogs have more fun!

[helping pets overcome fears] if your dog hates nail trimming or nail grinding, use this dog hammock for grooming. you can restrain him effortlessly, do his nail trimming, hair grooming, bathing and many more jobs easily with half the effort and twice the success!this dog grooming hammock can help dogs be at ease and calmly watch you work. you never need to fight with your pet for nail trimming again.
[simple and convenient to use] put the dog’s legs into the holes, clearly marked front and rear; then use the hooks to hang the hammock off the ground. if your dog feels nervous for the first time, try some snacks to soothe him. he will calm down quickly and have minimal difficulty.when your dog gets used to the hammock, she will even enjoy it.
[professional nail clippers and file]  our nail clippers are recommended by many professional pet groomers. this pair of nail clippers is professionally made with a safe guard blade, which can prevent you from the risk of over-cutting and causing damage to your pet’s nails. meanwhile, the kit is also equipped with a file, which can file the trimmed nails more round and smooth. most groomers and veterinary clinics like to use our tool set.
[suitable for various sizes dogs] the dog grooming sling hammock has four sizes for you to choose, large, medium，small and extra small. no matter what breed your dog is, you can find the corresponding size.  it’s suitable for any dog under 80 pounds. if you bought the wrong size or have any other issues, our 24 hour tailored service will work to make it right until you are satisfied.

From the brand

Depets, founded in 2016, is a professional pet supply brand. We specialize in pet daily necessities, toys, cleaning and grooming supplies.

Over the years, we have been dedicated to providing high-quality products and great services to pets and pet owners around the world. Our goal is to make a better life for pets with every pet owner.

Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Depets
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B08FJ655HL

Great Brush, Healthy Pets. The cat grooming brush with round beads can do massage for your pets and prevent scratching your pet’s skin. The design of stainless steel needles with a 60-degree bend and some elasticity is good for preventing skin disease and increasing blood circulation.
One-click Cleaning Button. You just have to Simply push the button and the hair will be super simple removed from the cat hair brush. Furthermore, our dog grooming brush is washable, which can be kept in clean.
Comfortable and Nonslip Handle. Our cat shedding brush is designed with a comfort-grip and nonslip handle, and this self cleaning cat brush also has a massage function for your hand and you won’t get tired easily when you brush your pet.
Enjoyable Brushing Experience. Grooming pets can strengthen communication and further the bond between you and your pets. Our pet brush is suitable for all breeds and coat types. With Depets dog and cat shedding brush, your beloved pet will enjoy the time of grooming.

From a variety kind of pet brushes, I chose this one for my own lovely pets (Yoyo & Yiyi). Every time I brush Yiyi, she rubs my hand and makes enjoyable meow. As for my doggy Yoyo, she always has a happy face when I do this to her. We all love this cat and dog shedding brush, so I want to share it with every pet owner and I hope you and your beloved pet will enjoy it like us.

Washable:Washable feature keep the brush hygienic

Size: 7.7″ ×4.1″(L×W)

Color: blue + white

Material: Stainless steel + ABS Plastic + Rubber

The round end of the needles can do massage for your pets without scratching his/her skins, which is good for preventing skin disease and increasing blood circulation.

The comfort-grip handle is designed to prevent hand and wrist strain.

Read more

Valuable Brush. This cat slicker brush can easily remove loose hair, shedding Mats, tangled hair, Dander and Dirt of your lovely pets, our cat brushes for indoor cats not only keep your pets clean, but also provide you with a hygienic home environment.

Healthy Pet. The dog shedding brush with round beads can increase blood circulation and keep your pet’s coat soft and shiny.

Read more

Usage

Step1: Brush your pet with gentle move.

Step2: Click the button.

Step3: Remove the hair from the pet brush.

Read more

How to reduce the pain during brushing?

  1. Hold the hair root with one hand, comb along the direction of hair growth with the other hand;
  2. When the hair knots are serious behind the ears and on the neck, the movements should be gentle;
  3. Comb the long hair layer by layer, turning the outer layer over and combing the inner layer.

What if my pet doesn’t like this dog and cat hair brush?

You can guide with snack, lengthen the grooming time every day, our self cleaning slicker brush is gentle and not stimulating, your cute pet will gradually like it.

Note:

  1. Store out of reach of children.
  2. Stress may cause skin irritation, you should brush your pet gently.
  3. Be careful with pets that suffer from skin irritation or weak skin sensitivity.

Read more

Defend Your Back Seat from Man’s Best Friend: Four layers of ultra-durable and waterproof Oxford fabric protects your car against scratches, scuffs, shedding, muddy paws, and puppy accidents!
Fits All Cars, Trucks, & SUVs: The Lusso Gear cover fits all back bench seats and is extra-large for maximum coverage. Front and side flaps provide full coverage to protect your entire seat. No more fur and mud on your upholstery!
Won’t Slip, Sag, or Slide: Install and remove your cover in a flash with security anchors and an added security strap. A non-slip backing means your cover and your dog stay put without leaving a stain on leather seats.
Seatbelt and Latch Accessible: The Lusso Gear cover never restricts access to seatbelts or latch points. It’s the perfect protector for two and four-legged passengers! The extra-wide slots make it easy to install baby and child seats.
Satisfaction Guaranteed: Cleanup is quick and easy thanks to a machine-washable cover! Wipe with a damp cloth or toss it in the wash for a deeper clean. If you aren’t satisfied with your purchase, let us know and we’ll work with you until you are.
